items.sentence: I now live in Boston in the US, but I plan to go back to Japan before the end of the year.
Tom just needs a little time to get used to the idea that Mary will now be his stepsister.
Sometimes, it\'s hard to tell when Tom is being serious and when he\'s just joking around.
You\'re not as beautiful as my ex-girlfriend, but you\'re a lot more fun to hang out with.
I had an appointment at 2:30, but I was caught in traffic and couldn\'t get there in time.
